content:
Sure, here's an example of how you can showcase your last two projects in a table format: | Company/Client | Project Title | Role | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Israel Air Force | Digital Architecture Optimization | Freelance System Architect | - Defined digital architecture and optimized the rescuing process
- Collaborated data and analyzed multi sensors using ML and decision formulas
- Supported the decision entity with the training process of different professions and roles | | Sindiana | Software Simulation for RAFAEL | Freelance Senior System Engineer and Architect | - Led the PDR and CDR for software simulation
- Worked on the preliminary and critical design review
- Developed software for simulation and testing purposes | Note: You can customize the table format as per your preference and add more details to each project if necessary.
